description: ISO 8327-1 OSI Session Protocol implementation for IEC 61850, based on libIEC61850 C library

NewSession.description: Creates a new session with default parameters (sessionRequirement=0x0002, selectors=[0,1], protocolOptions=0)

BuildConnectSPDU.description: Creates CONNECT SPDU (Session Protocol Data Unit) based on IsoSession_createConnectSpdu from C library. Uses default session parameters.

encodeConnectAcceptItem.signature: encodeConnectAcceptItem(buf []byte, offset int, options uint8) int
encodeConnectAcceptItem.description: Encodes Connect Accept Item parameter (private function)

encodeCallingSessionSelector.description: Encodes Calling Session Selector parameter (private function)

encodeCalledSessionSelector.description: Encodes Called Session Selector parameter (private function)

encodeSessionUserData.signature: encodeSessionUserData(buf []byte, offset int, payloadLength int) int
encodeSessionUserData.description: Encodes Session User Data parameter (private function)

buildConnectSPDUWithSession.description: Creates CONNECT SPDU using specified session (private function)
